channel.title: •i have a question on how to do something•
channel.description:
I'm hosting. My port is 1357, and when I work on a server on port 43594, so many people connect. I don't want to change the port to 43594 since I'll loose the people. I copied the line of code that says what port the server runs on. However, I got an error saying that there is already that line of code. So, is there like an alternate code that will let people in on port 43594 and 1357?
Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2008, 08:12:46 pm[/size][hr]Help!

item.title: •i have a question on how to do something•
